Frequently Asked Questions

How long does a typical project take?

Project timelines vary based on complexity. Simple websites take 2-4 weeks, while complex applications can take 3-6 months.

Do you provide ongoing support?

Yes, we offer comprehensive maintenance and support packages to keep your solutions running smoothly.

What technologies do you use?

We work with modern technologies including React, Node.js, Python, AWS, and many others based on project requirements.
